channel.title: 517 help :D
channel.description:
Okay well i'm currently coding a 517, and i just need a couple of answers. First thing: How Do You Add Npcs To the Server? (Like It Stays There Forever) How Do you Add Bonuses To An Item? And Finally,: How Do You Add Objects?
Thank-You For Your Time And Help, Even If You Just Read The Things Below, Thankz :D ___________________________________________________________________________________________________ [img]http://www.runetower.com/signatures/pose6/background20/SSBBbSBEZWRpY2F0ZWQgMiBIYXplUGt6/Omar.png[/img] [img]http://www.runetower.com/signatures/pose12/background26/SSBTdGFuZCBGb3IgSGF6ZVBreiE=/K1ll3d You X.png[/img]

item.title: 517 help :D
item.dc:creator: @mlgsnipe mlgsnipe
item.description:
@mlgsnipe wrote:

oh really,

anyways.

Open up autospawn.cfg, Find the Id copy one of the lines in there, Find your coords you want for it, Voila.

open up item.cfg Find the item, Change the numbers… Voila.

Open up Client.java Find “globalobject” Copy and paste one of those lines, change the Objectid, and coords, VOILA!

I am Coding A “517” Not a 317…

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic

item.title: 517 help :D
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

Ive never really looked at a 508, I just assumed it was close to the same. Sorry for wrong info.

Read full topic

item.title: 517 help :D
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:3, topic:351160”][quote author=mlgsnipe link=topic=447516.msg3284383#msg3284383 date=1280098489]
Okay well i’m currently coding a 517
[/quote]
oh really,

anyways.

Open up autospawn.cfg, Find the Id copy one of the lines in there, Find your coords you want for it, Voila.

open up item.cfg Find the item, Change the numbers… Voila.

Open up Client.java Find “globalobject” Copy and paste one of those lines, change the Objectid, and coords, VOILA![/quote]
A 508 loading 525 isn’t a 317… The only thing you’re correct about is changing an items bonus.

Read full topic

Open up Client.java Find “globalobject” Copy and paste one of those lines, change the Objectid, and coords, VOILA!
